snippet.title: Harrowed World: What's Past Is Portents - Vampire Visual Novel Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2715020/Harrowed_World_Whats_Past_Is_Portents__Vampire_Visual_Novel/

With thanks to Vandraho for providing the voiceover for this trailer: https://www.twitch.tv/vandraho 
And thanks to Stefan Sima for providing the music and sound design for this trailer: https://www.instagram.com/stefan.sima 

Step into a dark and unforgiving world where vampires pull the strings of humanity. You are not the hero, you are not the villain, you are nothing but a pawn in schemes that you cannot even begin to understand.

Become enthralled by the insidious immortals that have secretly dominated world affairs for centuries in this captivating narrative experience, elegantly presented in a gothic-style visual novel format.

_______________

Subscribe to the newsletter: https://www.harrowedworld.com/newsletter

Harrowed World is a fictional setting and all stories set within are fictious. Names, characters, businesses, websites, events, and incidents are the products of the author’s imagination. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events, businesses or websites is purely coincidental and not intended by the author. Certain long-standing institutions, agencies, and public offices may be mentioned, but the characters involved are wholly imaginary and these groups are not meant to accurately represent their real-world counterparts.

#vampirevisualnovel #visualnovel #vampire
